a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Artificial intelligence: Performance on knowledge tests vs. training
Performance on knowledge tests is measured with the MMLU benchmark, here with 5-shot learning, which gauges a model’s
accuracy after receiving only five examples for each task. Training computation is measured in total petaFLOP, which is 10¹⁵
Note: The values for training computation are estimates and come with some uncertainty, especially for models for which only minimal
information has been disclosed, such as GPT-4.
